name: Payroll Sheet
query:
select if(id=1,employee,'الإجمالى العام') as 'كودالموظف::120', if(id=1,employee_name,'-') as 'إسم الموظف::250',  
if(id=1,department,'-') as 'الإدارة::170', gross_pay as 'الإستحقاقات:Currency:100', 
total_deduction as 'الإستقطاعات:Currency:100', total_loan_repayment as 'الأقساط:Currency:100', net_pay as 'الصافى:Currency:100' from (
select 1 as id, ss.employee, ss.employee_name, ss.designation, ss.department, ss.name, round(ss.gross_pay,2) as gross_pay, round(ss.total_deduction,2) as total_deduction, round(ss.total_loan_repayment,2) as total_loan_repayment, round(ss.net_pay,2) as net_pay 
from `tabSalary Slip` ss
where ss.docstatus=%(docst)s and month(ss.end_date)=%(mm)s and ss.salary_slip_type=%(sst)s and ss.company=%(company)s and ss.business_unit=%(business_unit)s
union all
select 9 as id, '9999999999', '','','','', round(sum(ss.gross_pay),2), round(sum(ss.total_deduction),2), round(sum(ss.total_loan_repayment),2), round(sum(ss.net_pay),2) from `tabSalary Slip` ss
where ss.docstatus=%(docst)s and month(ss.end_date)=%(mm)s and ss.salary_slip_type=%(sst)s and ss.company=%(company)s and ss.business_unit=%(business_unit)s
order by id, employee, name) h
